data.name: Server_audit_active
data.type: if the auditing is actually working. it gets the on value when the logging is successfully started. then it can get the off value if the logging was stopped or log records can't be properly stored due to file or syslog errors.

data.name: Server_audit_current_log
data.type: the name of the logfile or the syslog parameters that are in current use.

data.name: Server_audit_last_error
data.type: if something went wrong with the logging here you can see the message.

data.name: Server_audit_writes_failed
data.type: the number of log records since last logging-start that weren't properly stored because of errors of any kind.
